```{r}
format_dates <- function(df){
  df %>%
    mutate(
    last_interaction = as.Date(
      last_interaction, 
      format = "%d/%m/%Y"
      ),
    days_since_last_interaction = Sys.Date() - last_interaction,
    days_since_last_interaction = as.numeric(days_since_last_interaction),
    last_visited_date = as.Date(
      last_visited_date, 
      format = "%d/%m/%Y"
      ),
    days_since_last_visit = Sys.Date() - last_visited_date,
    days_since_last_visit = as.numeric(days_since_last_visit)
    )
}
```
